Package marytts.vocalizations

Class Summary
FDPSOLASynthesisTechnology FDPSOLA Synthesis technology to synthesize vocalizations
HNMFeatureFileReader Reads a single file which contains HNM analysis features of vocalizations
HNMSynthesisTechnology HNM Synthesis technology to synthesize vocalizations
KMeansClusterer  
MLSAFeatureFileReader Reads a single file which contains all MLSA features (logfo, mgc and strengths) of vocalizations
MLSASynthesisTechnology MLSA Synthesis technology to synthesize vocalizations
SourceTargetPair Class represents Source unit, target unit and contour distance between these units.
VocalisationLabelInspector  
VocalizationAnnotationReader Reader class for manual annotation of vocalizations The format of the file should be as following examples: (first line indicates list of feature names) categories|name|voicequality|angry|sadness|amusement|happiness|contempt|solidarity|antagonism|certain|agreeing|interested|anticipation Obadiah_049|right|modal|2|3|1|1|2|2|1|0|0|-1|0 Poppy2_078|yeah|modal|1|1|1|2|1|2|1|-1|0|-1|0 Prudence_058|(laughter)|breathy|1|1|3|2|1|2|1|0|0|0|-1 Poppy2_085|yeah|breathy|1|2|1|1|1|2|1|0|0|-1|0
VocalizationCandidate Class represents a vocalization candidate
VocalizationFeatureFileReader  
VocalizationIntonationReader Vocalization contours and their corresponding polynomial coeffs reader from a intonation timeline reader file
VocalizationSelector Select suitable vocalization for a given target using a cost function
VocalizationSynthesisTechnology An abstract class for vocalization syntehsis technology
VocalizationSynthesizer The vocalization synthesis module.
VocalizationUnit Representation of a unit from a unit database.
VocalizationUnitFileReader Loads a unit file in memory and provides accessors to the start times and durations.
